title: Finance_360
description: Financial data from various sources, enabling a comprehensive view of financial activities and customer transactions.

table.title: financial_transactions
table.description: Contains financial transaction details, including transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount, and other relevant attributes.

workflow.title: Financial Transactions Workflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing financial transaction data.

table.title: credit_scores
table.description: Contains credit score information of customers, including customer_id, credit_score, credit_limit, and other relevant attributes.

workflow.title: Credit Scores Workflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing credit score data.

table.title: investment_portfolio
table.description: Contains information about customer's investment portfolio, including customer_id, asset_class, investment_amount, and other relevant attributes.

workflow.title: Investment Portfolio Workflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing investment portfolio data.

table.title: income_expenses
table.description: Contains income and expenses information of customers, including customer_id, income_amount, expense_amount, and other relevant attributes.

workflow.title: Income Expenses Workflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing income and expenses data.

lens.name: Finance Insights Lens
lens.description: Provides insights into customer financial behavior and trends.

Compute_Cluster.Title: Compute Cluster
Compute_Cluster.Description: Utilized for large-scale financial data processing and analysis.

Streaming_Cluster.Title: Real-time Data Processing Cluster
Streaming_Cluster.Description: Employed for real-time processing of financial transactions and events.

Details.Broker_Instance_Type: Instance type with at least 16 CPU cores and 64 GB RAM per broker.

Database Storage.Title: Financial Data Warehouse
Database Storage.Description: Utilized as the central repository for financial data storage and retrieval.

Details.Storage: Capacity to store extensive financial datasets.

SQL.Title: SQL
SQL.Description: For querying and manipulating financial data efficiently.

R.Title: R
R.Description: Utilized for statistical analysis and visualization of financial trends.

Tableau.Title: Tableau
Tableau.Description: For creating interactive visualizations and dashboards for financial insights.

TechnicalSpecifications.Title: Finance 360 Lens
TechnicalSpecifications.Description: Empowers financial institutions with comprehensive insights into customer financial activities.

Features.Transaction Monitoring and Analysis: Allows for detailed tracking and analysis of customer transactions for fraud detection and pattern recognition.

Recency.Title: Transaction Recency
Recency.Description: Analyzes the recency of customer transactions for targeted marketing and personalized financial services.
Recency.Usage: Identifies recent transaction patterns for tailored offerings.

Frequency.Title: Transaction Frequency
Frequency.Description: Analyzes the frequency of customer transactions to understand financial habits and preferences.
Frequency.Usage: Identifies high-frequency customers for loyalty programs and promotional offers.

Monitoring.Title: Financial Monitoring
Monitoring.Description: Continuously monitors financial activities for early detection of anomalies and suspicious behaviors.
Monitoring.Usage: Ensures financial security and customer trust through proactive monitoring.

Customer Transactions.Title: Customer Transactions
Customer Transactions.Description: Attributes related to customer financial transactions for analysis.

Attributes.Description: Unique identifier of the financial transaction
Identifier of the customer associated with the transaction
Date and time of the transaction
Amount involved in the transaction
Type of financial transaction (e.g., debit, credit)
Category of the transaction (e.g., groceries, entertainment)
Method used for the payment (e.g., credit card, cash)
Currency used for the transaction
Type of card used in the transaction
Name of the merchant where the transaction took place
City where the merchant is located
Country where the merchant operates

Credit Scores.Title: Credit Scores
Credit Scores.Description: Attributes related to customer credit scores for analysis and risk assessment.

Attributes.Description: Unique identifier of the customer's credit profile
Numeric value representing the customer's creditworthiness
Maximum amount a customer can borrow or spend
Percentage of credit limit currently used by the customer
Date of the last update to the credit score

Investment Portfolio.Title: Investment Portfolio
Investment Portfolio.Description: Attributes related to customer investment holdings and transactions for analysis.

Attributes.Description: Identifier of the customer's investment portfolio
Type of asset in which the customer has invested
Amount invested in the asset
Date of the investment transaction

Income Expenses.Title: Income Expenses
Income Expenses.Description: Attributes related to customer income and expenses for financial analysis.

Attributes.Description: Identifier of the customer's income and expenses record
Amount of income earned by the customer
Amount of money spent by the customer
Date of the income or expense transaction
Category of the transaction (e.g., salary, rent)
Type of financial transaction (e.g., income, expense)
Currency in which the transaction amount is recorded

GovernancePoliciesAndStewardship.Title: Finance Governance Policies and Stewardship
GovernancePoliciesAndStewardship.Description: Establishing policies and roles for effective data governance and stewardship in financial data management.

AccessControl.RoleBasedAccess: Granting access based on roles to maintain data security and confidentiality.
AccessControl.DiscretionaryAccess: Implementing access controls to protect sensitive financial information.

StewardResponsibilities.Title: Finance Steward Responsibilities
StewardResponsibilities.Description: Defining roles and responsibilities for data ownership and stewardship in the financial domain.
Responsibilities: Maintaining data integrity and accuracy in financial records.
Ensuring compliance with financial regulations and standards.

DataQualityAndGovernance.Title: Financial Data Quality Measures and Standards
DataQualityAndGovernance.Description: Ensuring high-quality financial data through rigorous measures and adherence to standards.
DataQualityAndGovernance.Approach: Comprehensive assessment across dimensions such as accuracy, completeness, timeliness, consistency, and integrity.
DataQualityAndGovernance.AuditsAndFeedback: Regular audits and feedback mechanisms to improve the quality and reliability of financial data.

CleansingAndPreprocessing.Title: Financial Data Cleansing and Preprocessing
CleansingAndPreprocessing.Description: Thorough cleaning and preprocessing procedures to ensure data accuracy and consistency in financial records.
Processes: Removing duplicate entries and inconsistencies in financial data.
Transforming and standardizing data formats for uniformity.
Handling missing values and outliers to enhance data quality.
Applying algorithms for data imputation and validation in financial datasets.

FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Title: Risk Assessment and Management
FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Description: Analyze credit scores and financial behaviors to assess and manage financial risk effectively.

FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Title: Investment Portfolio Optimization
FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Description: Utilize portfolio analysis to optimize investment strategies and maximize returns for clients.

FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Title: Income-Expense Tracking
FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Description: Track income and expenses to provide insights for budgeting and financial planning.

FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Title: Fraud Detection
FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Description: Implement AI algorithms to detect fraudulent financial activities and protect customer assets.

FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Title: Customer Profitability Analysis
FinancialAnalysisUseCases.Description: Analyze customer transactions to identify profitable segments and tailor services accordingly.
